home.described: I use JavaScript to calculate, manipulate, and validate different data to create dynamic and interactive user experiences.
I use React because it is an excellent tool with which I can  create interactive applications for mobile, web, and other platforms.
A good experience working with HTML programming language for developing best-in-class custom websites and applications.
I use Express.js to simplify the web application development process, making it easier to write fast, secure, and modular applications.
I use MongoDB for optimizing the performance of transactional stores and for high volume data storage purposes.
I use Node.js to create traditional websites, back-end API services, and data-intensive real-time applications that run across distributed devices.

projects.described: When I entered this world of programming, the first thing I learned was HTML and CSS. Here I attach my first portfolio, created only in HTML and CSS/SASS
This project was one more step towards React concepts and how we implement interactivity and dynamics in an app. It was a challenge at the time ðŸ™‚
This is the first chapter in a step-by-step about main React concepts. At the time I thought it was phenomenal. ðŸ˜„
A new challenge at the end of React was to implement/clone an application that would offer more interactivity.It was as interesting as it was learnable and practical.
Who doesn't wish they could organize their time better? Here I created a ToDo App to optimize my time and achieve more learning
Stack: React(Vite), Auth0, Firebase, SendGrid, SWR, Stripe, Express,MongoDB, Mongoose. Feature: Real-Live Chat, Admins Dashboard to control the Data, Auth0, Online payment, etc.
